Headline: #47 47th Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 47th/St. Lawrence
ShortDescription: Eastbound 47 47th buses are temporarily rerouted via 47th, St. Lawrence, 51st, Cottage Grove and 47th: due to, street blockage near 47th/St. Lawrence.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #47 47th buses are temporarily rerouted via 47th, St. Lawrence, 51st, Cottage Grove and 47th: due to, street blockage near 47th/St. Lawrence.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #155 Devon Temporary Reroute near Devon/Clark
ShortDescription: 155 Devon buses temp. rerouted EB via Devon, Clark, Morse and Terminal; WB via Morse, Sheridan, Pratt, Clark and Devon due to police activity near Devon/Clark.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#155 Devon buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to police activity near Devon/Clark. 

  • Eastbound buses will operate via Devon, Clark, Morse and Terminal.
  • Westbound buses will operate via Morse, Sheridan, Pratt, Clark and Devon.

Allow extra travel time.
